title: Pete Gaynor
added: With the resignation of [[Chad Wolf]] in January 2021, Gaynor became the acting [[Secretary of Homeland Security]] on January 12, 2021.<ref>{{Cite news |last=Alvarez  |first=Priscilla |last2=Sands |first2=Geneva |date=January 12, 2021 |title=Sudden change to Homeland Security leadership raises new worries at the worst possible time |work=CNN |url=https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/12/politics/homeland-security-wolf-gaynor-leadership/index.html |url-status=live |access-date=January 12, 2021}}</ref>
